text: For people complaining, here’s some examples of what DEIA actually is. Trainings to prevent sexual harassment in the workplace are part of DEI initiatives. Pay transparency laws are the result of DEI initiatives. Requiring wheel chair ramps and closed … See more

Costco, please stand firm in maintaining your commitment to DEI.  My husband and I have been loyal Costco customers for nearly 40 years.  We regularly shop at Costco both at our local warehouse and online.  In appreciation for your commitment to DEI an… See more

if Costco had to versions of a item people were scanning the less expensive item and putting the more expensive in their carts which is theft. Costco isn't replacing employees they just move them to another part of the warehouse, Walmart just cuts their hours

you obviously never been to Sam's and used the scan and go. Each item has it own barcode no and when they scan you everything has to match. So if you scan an item and put it back and get another one, they will know. It's a great feature.
been to tons of Sam's clubs and have used scan and go before the system isn't perfect there are way to cheat the system still not go give people ideas

Dude, people who steal are gonna steal. Millions of dollars are spent yearly to address shrinkage, and still the problem exists. That isn't what DEI does. Stop listening to Faux "news".

Any preference shown to any applicant regarding race, creed, color, gender, perceived gender or sexual preference is discriminatory. The only qualifications for the job should be whether the applicant meets the requirements for the job and outperforms the others. Anything else is racism and discrimination. Purchased the Cruise phone package from AT&T after purchasing my phone from Costco. Got on the ship and it never worked. I have the receipt email showing that I purchased it and AT&T says I’ve never purchased. It says they’ll put notes in the file. nobody calls me, and there are no notes, so I ask what happened and they said they could sell me $100 cruise line it didn’t work bottom line is I use the phone three times and a few text it cost me $550 and Costco AT&T want to talk to me about it Costco says they’ll have somebody call me. AT&T calls me literally 14 times this person has called And never ever told me a time to call back or when I answer it hangs up this is a joke. Do not get your phone at Costco from AT&T.

Pat, we're sorry to learn of this, we hate to disappoint. We've recently added the ability to view warehouse inventory in our Costco Mobile App. You can now tap on the warehouse tab and then search an item by name or item number. We hope this helps, and you can rest assured we'll note your feedback on your experience! -Christina

Do not buy the Mens reversible work gloves, by Head. What a name, can’t get your hand back in the glove, can’t reverse glove lining either.

Grace- We’re sorry to hear of your disappointment with the purchase. We certainly want our products to be the highest quality and we will forward your feedback accordingly. Please know that you can always return any dissatisfactory product to your local warehouse. If the product is not available, we’ll do our best to process your return without it. We understand returning the product might not be easy or convenient. However, all returns are handled at the local warehouse. -Kim

Truly, I say, why in God's great creation would a company called "Head" know how to make gloves? They clearly specialize in millinery. I have high expectations of the Costco brand, and for its sake, I dearly hope that next time your merchandisers are a little more diligent in their vocation and procure their gloves from a company called Hand, or Fingers, or something of the like.

The roasted chicken line is worth but I have a few not fully cooked … I had to toss it as it didn’t cook after I place it in the oven

A Eleonora- We want to assure you that Costco's policy is to cook the rotisserie chickens to an internal temperature of 183°F, way above the USDA 160°F requirements. Color of the meat is not indicative of whether or not the product is fully cooked as there are many external and environmental factors that can cause meat to be pink yet fully cooked. The only way to determine the safety of fully cooked meat is by taking the temperature. We certainly appreciate you sharing your feedback and encourage to contact your local warehouse to discuss any concerns you may have in future. -Bekah

Betty- Please contact Costco.com for all inquiries regarding online products and shipping information. Their contact information can be found here: https://customerservice.costco.com/.../answer_view/a_id/8162 They would be happy to help! -Max
Do I need the booklet with coupons or is it automatically discontinued when I use the card?

A Eleonora- The savings should automatically be deducted when purchasing a qualifying item without having to scan any barcodes. If you have any additional questions or concerns please don’t hesitate to reach out to us by chat or phone at the following page: https://customerservice.costco.com/ -Bekah
